title: MonetaGo Delivers Major Milestones in Strategy for Trade Finance De-duplication in India, Sets the Stage for Global Adoption in 2022 - Business Wire
content: MonetaGo Delivers Major Milestones in Strategy for Trade Finance De-duplication in India, Sets the Stage for Global Adoption in 2022  Business Wire
description: Four years after commencing an ambitious mission to prevent duplicate financing of invoices in India, MonetaGo today underlines major progress in deli
